description: The fields that make up the manifest of a version 1 investigative earch

creation_date.description: The date the story manifest was created

data_metadata.description: Information about the date being ingested

entities.description: A list of entities that will used in the story flow or are relevant to the security investigation.

how_to_implement.description: A discussion on how to implement this search, from what needs to be ingested, config files modified, and suggested per site modifications

maintainers.description: An array of the current maintainers of the Analytic Story.

company.description: Company associated with the person maintaining this search

email.description: Email address of the person maintaining this search

name.description: Name of the person maintaining this search

modification_date.description: The date of the most recent modification to the search

original_authors.description: A list of the original authors of the search

company.description: Company associated with the person who originally authored the search

email.description: Email address of the person who originally authored the search

name.description: Name of the person who originally authored the search

data_eventtypes.description: A list of eventtypes, if any, used by this search

data_source.description: A high-level description of the type of data needed for this search to complete

data_sourcetypes.description: The list of sourcetypes, if any, used by this search

data_models.description: A list of data models, if any, used by this search

providing_technologies.description: A list of technologies that provide this data

spec_version.description: The version of the investigative search specification this manifest follows

phantom_server.description: IP address and username of the phantom server. Currently, we will ship this value as automation (hostname) and we encourage the users to modify those values according to their environment. Eg: automation (hostname)

playbook_display_name.description: Display Name of the playbook. Capitalize each letter and remove underscores from playbook_name field. Eg: Simple Network Enrichment

playbook_name.description: Name of the playbook. This name should be the same as the name on phantom community repository on github with underscores and appended with community/<playbook_name>. The playbooks are hosted on https://github.com/phantomcyber/playbooks. Eg: community/simple_network_enrichment

playbook_url.description: Url of the playbook on Phantom website.

sensitivity.description: TLP colors (White, Green, Amber or Red)

investigate_window.description: The fields associated on when this search should run relative to the detection event

earliest_time_offset.description: The number of seconds into the past from the event time the search should cover

latest_time_offset.description: The number of seconds into the future from the event time the search should cover

search.description: The search (in SPL) executed within core Splunk for investgation.

description.description: A description of what the search is designed to detect

id.description: The unique identifier for the search

product_type.description: Type of product that will support this investigate object.

title: Investigative Search Manifest
